|| *reproductiveCondition* || definition ||
|| vegetative || Stage of growth when vegetative structures are being produced. No reproductive structures present. ||
|| flowering || The stage at which flower buds are present or any flower(s) on the plant are open. ||
|| fruiting || Formation of the seed-bearing structure after flowering or maturation of the fruit. ||
